title: Manic Panic Virgin Snow
description: Manic Panic Classic Formula Semi Permanent Hair Color Cream is the best of its kind! Gives hair bold, brilliant color.

title: Soft 'N Style Hair Colorist Tool Kit (8 Piece)
description: Soft 'N Style hair colorist tool kit. Kit includes bowl, regular and long tail dye brushes. 3-in-1 coloring tool. Jumbo rake comb, 3 long hair clips and tote.

title: Hair Cutting Scissors Precision 3-piece Barber Shears Set
description:
Take Advantage Of Our Daily Sales On The Hottest Selling Catalog Products.  
All New, In Original Packages.... 
3 piece Barber's Shear Set
Barber Shears 5 "
Barger Shears 6 "
Salon Shears 6 "
Cutting the kids of your husband's hair at home is convenient and saves money, but to do the job right, you need the right tools.  This 3 piece Barbers Shears set gives you professional quality.  Barber Shears in two sizes for perfectly balanced trimming and cutting, plus Salon Shears for layering and texturing hair.  Durable stainless steel with easy grip "pinkie guard" handles.  

We're Confident That You'll Love Our Products.... But If You Are Not Satisfied For Any Reason Feel Free To Contact Customer Service Via Email.

Please Note Any Questions/Inquiries Received On Sat & Sun Will Be Answered First Thing Monday Morning. As Customer Service Is Available Monday Thru Friday Between The Hours Of 9-5 pm.
